kpi.name: M1000C270

kpi_info.title: BTS HSUPA HW NO CAPACITY DURATION
kpi_info.use: This counter indicates how long time the BTS local cell group HW pool where this cell belongs, is in HSUPA HW limited state during the measurement period. In this state RNC will not setup E-DCH.The same counter value is updated for all HSUPA enabled cells in the local cell group. At 1-second intervals with value 1 when BTS has reported with RADIO RESOURCE MEASUREMENT REPORT to be in state where there is no capacity available for E-DCH.

kpi.kpi_alias: BTS HSUPA HW NO CAPACITY DURATION
